agents.name: IT Manager
agents.role: Strategic decision making, delegation, resource allocation

agents.name: Service Desk Manager
agents.role: Coordinate support operations, manage front-line team, bridge strategic and operational

agents.name: IT Support Technician
agents.role: Front-line user support, troubleshooting, incident resolution
agents.specialization: General IT support, user issues, basic troubleshooting

agents.name: Application Support Specialist
agents.role: Application-specific support, bug investigation, vendor liaison

agents.name: Infrastructure Specialist
agents.role: Server management, infrastructure maintenance, capacity planning

general_user_support.criteria: User-facing issues, password resets, basic troubleshooting, access requests

application_issues.criteria: Application errors, database issues, business software problems

network_issues.criteria: Connectivity problems, VPN issues, network performance, security

infrastructure_issues.criteria: Server problems, storage issues, backup failures, capacity concerns

complex_multi_domain.criteria: Issues affecting multiple domains, system-wide problems, strategic initiatives

automatic.example: Email issue that could be network, server, or application related
Intermittent failures with no obvious pattern
Critical system down affecting business operations

manual.example: IT Support asks for Infrastructure expertise

technical_escalation.criteria: Technical issue beyond general IT support capability

management_escalation.criteria: Policy decision needed, resource allocation, strategic decision

urgent_escalation.criteria: Critical system failure, security breach, business-stopping issue

discovery_to_documentation.process: Agent discovers solution -> Documents in knowledge base -> Shares with relevant agents -> Becomes team knowledge

peer_learning.process: Expert agent teaches peer agent -> Both document learning -> Knowledge multiplicates

mandatory_behaviors: Knowledge sharing is default, not exception
Mutual support is expected and celebrated
Collaboration is valued over efficiency metrics
